Magnetometer.summary: NOTE Experimental The Magnetometer interface of the Sensor APIs provides information about the magnetic field as detected by the device's primary magnetometer sensor.

remarks.para: To use this sensor, the user must grant permission to the 'magnetometer' device sensor through the Permissions API. In addition, this feature may be blocked by a Permissions Policy set on your server.

MagnetometerMagnetometer.summary:
NOTE Experimental The Magnetometer() constructor
creates a new object which returns information about the
magnetic field as detected by a device's primary magnetometer sensor.

MagnetometerX.summary:
NOTE Experimental The x read-only property of the
interface returns a number specifying
the magnetic field around the device's x-axis.

MagnetometerZ.summary:
NOTE Experimental The z read-only property of the
interface returns a number specifying
the magnetic field around the device's z-axis.

MagnetometerY.summary:
NOTE Experimental The y read-only property of the
interface returns a number specifying
the magnetic field around the device's y-axis.
